Package report

Class QuarterlyHistogramController

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.QuarterlyHistogramController
  • public class QuarterlyHistogramController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for quarterlyHistogramScreen.fxml this controller handles viewing amount of orders or amount of income in a specific year,branch,quarter The ceo is able to view this quartely report and also compare the data to another year,branch,quarter To handle this the class uses XYChart.Series to display data in a BarChart we get data using keyword Load_quarter_data
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yeela Malka

      branch_histogram BarChart that holds our data in a histogram fashion

      compare_lbl lbl next to checkbox

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) void back​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      activates on back back button press to return to previous report screen
      private javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<?> defineListener​(int flag)
      Method creates a Listener to validate input using the validate_input method we use this to set listeners for validation on our comboboxes
      void initialize()
      initalizes our controller by setting all the combobox, hiding fields not relevant till user checks compare checkbox, also disables show_branch_btn until the user has inputted all data nessecary we validate using an event listener that calls validate_input function
      (package private) void showBranch​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      function for showing histogram to user activates on show_branch_btn press here here we define a series using the data from users combobox inputs we call updateSeries to get data from DB from each users selection
      private javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Series updateSeries​(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> quarter, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> year, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> type, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Branch> branch)
      Function for getting data according to users comboBoxes we do this by calling server with Load_suppliers_by_branch to first check if the restaurant exists if it doesnt we return an empty series if it does we get the rest of the combo box inputs calling for each supplier the server with Load_quater_data along this gets information from DB and inputs it into OrderClient.income if it's income report or OrderClient.orderAmount of it's an amount of order report once we have the data we set it to a series and we return that series
      private void validate_input()
      validates user input counts if all the nesaccery combo boxes have been selected, if user compares reports he must input 7 combo boxes else he must input 4 comboboxes

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        initalizes our controller by setting all the combobox, hiding fields not relevant till user checks compare checkbox, also disables show_branch_btn until the user has inputted all data nessecary we validate using an event listener that calls validate_input function

      • defineListener

        private javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<?> defineListener​(int flag)
        Method creates a Listener to validate input using the validate_input method we use this to set listeners for validation on our comboboxes
        Parameters:
        flag - flag 1 for a listener on strings flag 2 for listener on branch(entity)
        Returns:
        ChangeListener
        See Also:
        validate_input()

      • validate_input

        private void validate_input()
        validates user input counts if all the nesaccery combo boxes have been selected, if user compares reports he must input 7 combo boxes else he must input 4 comboboxes

      • showBranch

        void showBranch​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        function for showing histogram to user activates on show_branch_btn press here here we define a series using the data from users combobox inputs we call updateSeries to get data from DB from each users selection
        Parameters:
        event - Action event for action details

      • updateSeries

        private javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Series updateSeries​(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> quarter,
                                                       javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> year,
                                                       javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> type,
                                                       javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Branch> branch)
        Function for getting data according to users comboBoxes we do this by calling server with Load_suppliers_by_branch to first check if the restaurant exists if it doesnt we return an empty series if it does we get the rest of the combo box inputs calling for each supplier the server with Load_quater_data along this gets information from DB and inputs it into OrderClient.income if it's income report or OrderClient.orderAmount of it's an amount of order report once we have the data we set it to a series and we return that series
        Parameters:
        quarter - ComboBox for choosing quarter
        year - ComboBox for choosing year
        type - ComboBox for choosing type or report(income, amount of orders)
        branch - ComboBox for choosing a branch
        Returns:
        XYChar.series

      • back

        void back​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        activates on back back button press to return to previous report screen
        Parameters:
        event - Action event for event details
